# name of project and executable
PROJECT(multiTaskTutorialExample7)

# Set include/link directories
cisst_set_directories (cisstCommon cisstOSAbstraction cisstMultiTask)

# add include paths
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${multiTaskTutorialExample7_SOURCE_DIR})

# magic CMake command, generate .cxx and .h from .fl files
# then compile them and link them with the executable
FLTK_WRAP_UI(multiTaskTutorialExample7 displayUI.fl)

# name the main executable and specifies with source files to use
ADD_EXECUTABLE(multiTaskTutorialExample7
               # code files to compile
               sineTask.cpp
               displayTask.cpp
               main.cpp
               UITask.cpp
               # header files are provided for information
               sineTask.h
               displayTask.h
               UITask.h
               # files generated by fluid
               ${multiTaskTutorialExample7_FLTK_UI_SRCS}
	       )

# link with the cisst libraries
cisst_target_link_libraries(multiTaskTutorialExample7 cisstCommon cisstOSAbstraction cisstMultiTask)
